name: Steam Racer [DEMO]
description:
Your beloved was kidnapped by ruthless Sky Pirates, and the only path to rescuing her is through the perilous gauntlets set forth by the pirates themselves. The tyrannical, brutal Captain Ivan Stormbrew will stop at nothing to take control of the floating cities - humanities last ditch effort, escaping from the scorched earth below.

DEVELOPER NOTE:

This game is still in production and will be released in "parts".

CREDIT NOTES:

This game is developed from the tutorial from "HeartBeast" on YouTube. Check out his channel.

Enjoy!
